text_block_list.name: Mon贸logo
text_block_list.text:
It's the day of the tryouts, but before<n>the races begin, I go
to see how<n>Kawakami Princess is doing.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Hello, Trainer. You really came to see<n>my race.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I didn't get much sleep to be honest! I<n>was so nervous I
couldn't think<n>straight, so I watched all forty-nine<n>
episodes of Princess Fighter!
choice_data_list: Whoa, can you race after that?!
Whoa, can you race after that?!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I don't know! But even Princess<n>Fighter says princesses
have to risk it<n>all at the end, so I have to try!
choice_data_list: Well, I'll be here rooting for you.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Thank you! Okay, I should get going!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The weather's finally cleared after<n>last night's rain, but
which<n>Umamusume will be a breath of fresh<n>air and claim
their chance to debut?

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
All these evenly matched<n>Umamusume will make for a
highly<n>competitive race. Everyone's lined up<n>at the gates,
and... there's the start!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Huff... Puff...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: (Ah, it feels great to run with<n>everything I have!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: (I've always loved princesses, but I<n>love being active too.)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
(Then when I met King, I was really<n>impressed. Sure, she
has the dignity<n>of a princess, but... she also never<n>loses
spirit.)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
(Her and Princess Fighter have that<n>same dazzling strength.
It makes me<n>jealous of how bright and sparkly<n>they are...)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: (But what is it I really admire most?)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant... Ugh!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: (It's so hard... I just don't know. Itried copying them, but that didn'thelp. What do I want to be? Whatkind of princess do I want tobecome?)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
(Trainer said I have my own way, that<n>I have my own ideal
to aim for... But I<n>don't see it!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Agh!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Oh no, she slipped right before the<n>last turn! Kawakami
Princess is<n>hurtling toward the outside.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
That sent her into the mud. She<n>must've misjudged the
track... Ah<n>well, these things happen with<n>pre-debuts.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
It'll be hard to get back after that.<n>Kinda makes me feel bad
for her.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: (I don't understand... Can I really not<n>do this?)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: (Am I not meant to become... a<n>princess?)
choice_data_list: You can't stop! You're a princess after all!
You can't stop! You're a princess after all!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
She's regained control! Kawakami<n>Princess is running with
all her might<n>now. Will she be able to catch up to<n>the front
though?!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Will she make it? She can't close the<n>gap, but she's trying
hard.
choice_data_list: Go for it! Don't give up on your ideal self!
Go for it! Don't give up on your ideal self!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: I hear you... loud... and CLEAR!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
This is amazing! Kawakami Princess<n>is giving an amazing
chase. She's<n>going straight to the front from way<n>outside!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Aaagh! I... am... a princess! I willbecome a princess!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
(I see it now. All I really wanted was<n>to never give up... on
becoming a<n>princess and on being myself!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: (The whole point of an ideal is to helpme be a better me. It's all fornothing if I don't keep running for my dream and for myself!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Hraaaaagh!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: That's the finish!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Kawakami Princess was on fire! She<n>fought till the last and
made it all the<n>way to first place!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Look at me now! A princess smashes<n>through any
adversity!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Traineeer, I did it! I went for what I<n>wanted and took the win!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Thank you so much for cheering for<n>me! I could hear you so
clearly, and<n>I'll never forget it!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! I really do want to be a<n>beautiful, graceful, and
courageous<n>princess. But a princess...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Keeps on running through the worst<n>of it and never gives up
on herself! A<n>princess never gives up on her<n>ideals!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
So I don't care if I looked a little<n>ungraceful this time! I'm
going to<n>become graceful someday, in my own<n>special
way!

text_block_list.name: Mon贸logo
text_block_list.text:
Seeing her beaming expression, I<n>realize that I have to tell
her right now.
choice_data_list: I want to help you achieve your dream.
I want to help you achieve your dream.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Wha? You want to help? Wait, does<n>that mean what I think it
means?!
choice_data_list:
To be clear, I'm still nothing like Legendary
Trainer or anything...

text_block_list.name: Mon贸logo
text_block_list.text:
So long as she wants to become her<n>ideal version of a
princess, I want to<n>become a legendary trainer to help<n>her
along the way.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Waaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Of course! You opened my eyes when<n>I'd lost sight of my
dream!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I know I can be my ideal version of a<n>princess with your
help! I won't fail!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Our legend will rock the world!<n>Onward to beauty, grace, and<n>
becoming the strongest, fastest<n>princess there is!

text_block_list.name: Mon贸logo
text_block_list.text:
This is the day I start my adventure<n>with the rough and
tough Kawakami<n>Princess!
